definition: to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: I took a bottle of liquid medicine to kill the rat.
We can trap the mice by putting candies in the rat-bane.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以把糖果放進滅鼠藥裏，以此誘捕老鼠。

sentences.english: HP is a safe and effective treatment for severe children with acute poisoning.
sentences.chinese: HP爲治療滅鼠藥中毒危重患兒的有效手段。

sentences.english: I took a bottle of liquid medicine.
